author: lehors
msg: allows version to be an empty string in hasFeature.
The spec only says 'if not specified' so it could be interpreted both as
null or as an empty string.

author: andyc
msg: Some work was done on the design to work on the entity
in order to reflect its new purpose: to scan XML
In the new design, both the entity manager and entity
scanner are singletons (per parser instance). The
doc scanner's interaction with the entity scanner is
simplified and the entity scanner worries about making
the switching of underlying readers transparent.
I'll write up some detailed documentation later.
